name: WF-04: Nano Banana Pro Product Placement
description: Place a product into a scene using Nano Banana Pro (Gemini 3 Pro Image) with multi-reference support for accurate product identity
author: Amoeba Works

inputs.prompt: Place this office chair in a modern Scandinavian workspace. Natural daylight streaming through large windows, light wood flooring, white walls, minimal clutter. The chair should be positioned at a desk area, realistic shadows and lighting. Professional interior photography style, 85mm lens perspective.

inputs.text:
NANO BANANA PRO PRODUCT PLACEMENT WORKFLOW

=== INPUTS ===
- product_angle_1.png: Front view of product
- product_angle_2.png: Side view of product  
- product_angle_3.png: 3/4 angle view of product

=== PARAMETERS ===
- model_name: gemini-3-pro-image-preview
- image_count: 1 (increase for variations)
- use_search: false (set true to ground in web search)
- aspect_ratio: 4:3 (options: 1:1, 16:9, 9:16, etc.)
- image_size: 2K (options: 1K, 2K, 4K)
- temperature: 0.8 (lower = more faithful, higher = more creative)

=== PROMPT TEMPLATE ===
Place this [PRODUCT] in a [SCENE_TYPE]. [LIGHTING]. [ATMOSPHERE]. Professional [STYLE] photography.

=== SCENE EXAMPLES ===
- modern Scandinavian workspace
- executive corner office with city view
- creative studio with exposed brick
- minimal white showroom
- cozy home office

=== REQUIRED ===
Set GOOGLE_API_KEY environment variable in RunPod
